info.title: Data Import APIs
info.description: Manage messages, users, groups for a particular app using our Chat API.

post.description: The CometChat message import API allows customers to import their messages’ data into the CometChat systems.

<muid>.description: Wraps a single message object. The <muid> will be a primary key/unique Identifier of the message.

muid.description: The value should be the same as value of the placeholder <muid> which wraps the message object.

receiverType.description: The receiverType of the message. either user or group

receiver.description: If the receiverType == “user” the UID of a user receiving the message. else GUID of the group.

category.description: Category of the message. The available categories are message and custom.

type.description: If category==”message” then the allowed values for the type are: text: for a plain text message. image: for an image message audio: for an audio message video: for a video message file: for any file if category==”custom” the customized type can be used. The developer can send the type as any random string and can use it in the implementation at the UI

data.description: Can contain any additional properties except for the key properties.

text.description: The property has a fixed meaning for: 1. category==”message” && type ==”text” ⇒ it stores the text message 2. category==”message” && type !=”text” ⇒ it stores a caption for the attachment

customData.description: when category==”custom”, this property can have any JSON object.

attachments.description: For the messages with image, video, audio or file type (i.e. category=="message" && type !="text"), the property contains an array of attachment objects.

url.description: Contains the URL of the attachment. The developer has to make sure that the URL is accessible while calling the data_import API. The API will be downloading the attachment from its current location and upload it to CometChat’s attachment storage.

size.description: The size of the attachment(in bytes).

tags.description: String array containing developer defined tags.

sentAt.description: 10-digit UNIX timestamp for the time at which the message was sent.

deliveredAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the message was delivered to the receiver.

readAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the message was read by the receiver.

senderUserDetails.description: If all the users are imported before importing the messages. The JSON object contains the user details of the sender.

uid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the sender.

avatar.description: URL to the profile picture of the user sending the message.

link.description: Profile page URL of the sender.

role.description: Role of the sender. Should be created already via the Create role API.

createdAt.description: A 10-digit timestamp at which the sender was created.

lastActiveAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the sender was most recently online.

tags.description: A string array containing sender tags.

deactivatedAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the sender was deactivated/soft-deleted/blocked to use the chat services.

receiverUserDetails.description: If all the users are imported before importing the messages or else required if receiverType==”user”. The JSON object contains the user details of the receiver.

uid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the user receiving the message.

avatar.description: URL to the profile picture of the receiver.

link.description: Profile page URL of the receiver.

role.description: Role of the receiver. Should be created already via the Create role API.

createdAt.description: A 10-digit timestamp at which the receiver was created.

lastActiveAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the receiver was most recently online.

tags.description: A string array containing receiver tags.

deactivatedAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the receiver was deactivated/soft-deleted/blocked to use the chat services.

receiverGroupDetails.description: The JSON object contains the group details of the receiver.

guid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the group.

icon.description: An URL for a group icon.

type.description: Type of the group. Can be public, password or private.

password.description: A password required to join the the group with type password

createdAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the group was created.

tags.description: A string array containing grouptags.

receiverGroupOwnerDetails.description: The JSON object contains the user details of the owner.

uid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the owner.

avatar.description: URL to the profile picture of the owner.

link.description: Profile page URL of the owner.

role.description: Role of the owner. Should be created already via the Create role API.

createdAt.description: A 10-digit timestamp at which the owner was created.

lastActiveAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the owner was most recently online.

tags.description: A string array containing owner tags.

deactivatedAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the owner was deactivated/soft-deleted/blocked to use the chat services.

mentionedUserDetails.description: The description should say it is optional and should contain the user details if data.text contains a mention of the user with CometChat's mention template i.e. <@uid:UID>

<uid>.description: A map where each key is a user’s unique identifier (UID) and the value is that user’s details. The <uid> will be replaced by the mentioned user’s primary key.

uid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the owner. The value should be the same as value of the placeholder <uid> which wraps the mentionedUserDetails object.

avatar.description: URL to the profile picture of the owner.

link.description: Profile page URL of the owner.

role.description: Role of the owner. Should be created already via the Create role API.

createdAt.description: A 10-digit timestamp at which the owner was created.

lastActiveAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the owner was most recently online.

tags.description: A string array containing owner tags.

deactivatedAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the owner was deactivated/soft-deleted/blocked to use the chat services.

post.description: The CometChat user import API allows customers to import their users’ data into the CometChat systems.

<uid>.description: Wraps a user object. The <uid> will be a primary key/unique Identifier of the user.

uid.description: The value should be the same as value of the placeholder <uid> which wraps the user object.

avatar.description: URL to the profile picture of the user.

link.description: Profile page URL of the user.

role.description: Role of the user. Should be created already via the Create role API.

createdAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the user was created.

lastActiveAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the user was most recently online.

metadata.description: JSON object containing Additional user information.

tags.description: A string array containing usertags.

deactivatedAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the user was deactivated/soft-deleted/blocked to use the chat services.

post.description: The CometChat group import API allows customers to import their groups’ data into the CometChat systems.

<guid>.description: Wraps a group object. The <guid> will be a primary key/unique Identifier of the group.

guid.description: The value should be the same as value of the placeholder <guid> which wraps the group object.

icon.description: An URL for a group icon.

type.description: Type of the group. Can be public, password or private.

password.description: A password required to join the the group with type password

createdAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the group was created.

tags.description: A string array containing grouptags.

groupOwnerDetails.description: The JSON object contains the user details of the owner.

uid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the owner.

avatar.description: URL to the profile picture of the owner.

link.description: Profile page URL of the owner.

role.description: Role of the owner. Should be created already via the Create role API.

createdAt.description: A 10-digit timestamp at which the owner was created.

lastActiveAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the owner was most recently online.

tags.description: A string array containing owner tags.

deactivatedAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the owner was deactivated/soft-deleted/blocked to use the chat services.

post.description: The CometChat group member import API allows customers to import their group members’ data into the CometChat systems.

<guid>_member_<uid>.description: Wraps a single member object. The <guid>_member_<uid> will will be a primary key/unique Identifier of the member.

memberId.description: The value should be the same as value of the placeholder <guid>_member_<uid> which wraps the member object.

scope.description: Scope of the member in group.

isBanned.description: Specify if user is banned in group.

joinedAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the member joined the group.

groupDetails.description: The JSON object contains the group details of the member.

guid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the group.

icon.description: An URL for a group icon.

type.description: Type of the group. Can be public, password or private.

password.description: A password required to join the the group with type password

createdAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the group was created.

tags.description: A string array containing grouptags.

userDetails.description: The JSON object contains the user details of the member.

uid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the member.

avatar.description: URL to the profile picture of the member.

link.description: Profile page URL of the user.

role.description: Role of the user. Should be created already via the Create role API.

createdAt.description: A 10-digit timestamp at which the member was created.

lastActiveAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the member was most recently online.

metadata.description: JSON object containing Additional member information.

tags.description: A string array containing member tags.

deactivatedAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the member was deactivated/soft-deleted/blocked to use the chat services.

CategoryType.description: Type of entries in the list

entity.description: Entity type in which moderation will be performed.

operand.description: Type of message content to moderate (e.g., text, image, video, custom).

operator.description: Operation to be performed for condition evaluation (e.g., contains, equals).

category.description: Type of entries for evaluation, either 'word' or 'pattern'.

isKeywordReferencePresent.description: Indicates if the value contains a reference to a keyword list.

isMediaPresent.description: Indicates if the incoming message contains media content.

value.description: Actual value for the condition, or reference ID if isKeywordReferencePresent is true, or a formula if isMediaPresent is true.

useStoredEmailID.description: If enabled, the webhook will be triggered for a user only if their email address is stored within CometChat.

webhookURL.description: The webhook URL to be triggered for the respective events.

useBasicAuth.description: To enable basic auth for the URL

useStoredPhNo.description: If enabled, the webhook will be triggered for a user only if their phone number is stored within CometChat.

webhookURL.description: The webhook URL triggered for respective events

useBasicAuth.description: To enable basic auth for the URL

messagesSetting.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for all messages
3: Notify for messages with mentions

repliesSetting.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for all replies
3: Notify for replies with mentions

reactionsSetting.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for reactions received on own messages
3: Notify for reactions received on all messages

entity.description: Type of entity for group filter

operand.description: Field to apply the filter on for 'group'

type.description: Type of the filter, specifying sender or receiver

description.example: AI-powered video moderation to detect unsafe content.

id.description: Unique identifier for the moderation rule.

name.description: Descriptive name for the moderation rule.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the rule is active.

description.description: Detailed explanation of the rule's purpose.
description.example: AI-powered video moderation to detect unsafe content.

action.description: Actions to be taken when a violation is detected.

conditions.description: List of conditions that must be met for the rule to trigger.

file.description: CSV file containing the keywords or regex patterns for the list.

id.description: Unique identifier for the pattern list.

name.description: Descriptive name for the pattern list.

description.description: Detailed explanation of the pattern list's purpose.

searchTerms.description: Comma-separated values of keywords or regex patterns if no file is provided.
searchTerms.example: AI-powered video moderation to detect unsafe content.

includeMessageObjectSetting.description: Include the message object in the push payload

includeSenderMetadataSetting.description: Include the sender's metadata as part of the message object

includeReceiverMetadataSetting.description: Include the receiver's metadata as part of the message object

trimTextFieldSetting.description: Trim the text field if present.

includeMessageMetadataSetting.description: Include the message's metadata as part of the message object

customJson.description: A custom JSON object for miscellaneous data

file.description: CSV file containing the keywords or regex patterns for the list.

id.description: Unique identifier for the keyword list.

name.description: Descriptive name for the keyword list.

description.description: Detailed explanation of the keyword list's purpose.

disallowedSentences.description: Comma-separated sentences that are disallowed if the category is 'sentence-similarity'.

usePrivacyTemplate.description:
1: Use default templates
2: Use privacy templates
3: Use default templates with end-user privacy override

bodyGroup.example: You've received new messages in {{groupDetails.name}}! You can read the message at https://your-website.com.

bodyOneOnOne.example: You've received new messages from {{sender.name}}! You can read the message at https://your-website.com.

bodyGroup.example: You've received new messages in {{groupDetails.name}}! You can read the message at https://your-website.com.

bodyOneOnOne.example: You've received new messages from {{sender.name}}! You can read the message at https://your-website.com.

type.description: Type of the filter, specifying sender or receiver

entity.description: Type of entity for user filter

operand.description: Field to apply the filter on for 'user'

file.description: CSV file containing the keywords or regex patterns for the list.

id.description: Unique identifier for the word list.

name.description: Descriptive name for the word list.

description.description: Detailed explanation of the word list's purpose.

searchTerms.description: Comma-separated values of keywords or regex patterns if no file is provided.
searchTerms.example: AI-powered video moderation to detect unsafe content.

muid.description: The muid will be a unique Identifier of the message.

receiverType.description: The receiverType of the message. either user or group

category.description: Category of the message. The available categories is custom.

customData.description: when category==”custom”, this property can have any JSON object.

multipleReceivers.description: JSON containing array of UIDs and GUID for whom the message must be sent. Format for multiple receivers - {"uids": ["uid1","uid2"], "guids":["guid1"]}

tags.description: A list of tags to identify specific messages.

notifyForUnreadOnly.description: If the value is false, the notification will contain all the messages, not just unread.

guid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the group.

icon.description: An URL for a group icon.

type.description: Type of the group. Can be public, password or private.

password.description: A password required to join the the group with type password

createdAt.description: A 10-digit UNIX timestamp at which the group was created.

tags.description: A string array containing grouptags.

muid.description: The muid will be a unique Identifier of the message.

receiverType.description: The receiverType of the message. either user or group

category.description: Category of the message. The available categories is interactive.

type.description: Type of the message. The available values are card, form and customInteractive.

data.description: JSON containing message attributes. Please select the appropriate schema based on the type property.

multipleReceivers.description: JSON containing array of UIDs and GUID for whom the message must be sent. Format for multiple receivers - {"uids": ["uid1","uid2"], "guids":["guid1"]}

tags.description: A list of tags to identify specific messages.

muid.description: The muid will be a unique Identifier of the message.

receiverType.description: The receiverType of the message. either user or group

category.description: Category of the message. The available categories are message and custom.

type.description: Type of the message. The available values are text, image, file, audio, video.

attachments.description: For the messages with image, video, audio or file type (i.e. category=="message" && type !="text"), the property contains an array of attachment objects.

url.description: Contains the URL of the attachment.

size.description: The size of the attachment(in bytes).

multipleReceivers.description: JSON containing array of UIDs and GUID for whom the message must be sent. Format for multiple receivers - {"uids": ["uid1","uid2"], "guids":["guid1"]}

tags.description: A list of tags to identify specific messages.

moderationMessageData.description: Can contain any additional properties except for the key properties.

text.description:
The meaning of the `data.text` property depends on the values of `category` and `type`:
1. When `category` is `'message'` and `type` is `'text'`, it represents the text content of the message.
2. When `category` is `'message'` and `type` is not `'text'`, it represents the caption associated with the attachment.

customData.description: when category==”custom”, this property can have any JSON object.

attachments.description: For the messages with image, video, audio or file type (i.e. category=="message" && type !="text"), the property contains an array of attachment objects.

url.description: Contains the URL of the attachment. The developer has to make sure that the URL is accessible while calling the API. The API will be downloading the attachment from its current location and upload it to CometChat’s attachment storage.

size.description: The size of the attachment(in bytes).

until.description: This is a valid timestamp from the future, E.g: 1710696964705

messagesSetting.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for all messages
3: Notify for messages with mentions

repliesSetting.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for all replies
3: Notify for replies with mentions

reactionsSetting.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for reactions received on own messages
3: Notify for reactions received on all messages

groupMessages.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for all messages
3: Notify for messages with mentions

groupReplies.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for all replies
3: Notify for replies with mentions

groupReactions.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for reactions received on own messages
3: Notify for reactions received on all messages

oneOnOneMessages.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for all messages
3: Notify for messages with mentions

oneOnOneReplies.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for all replies
3: Notify for replies with mentions

oneOnOneReactions.description:
1: Don't notify
2: Notify for reactions received on own messages
3: Notify for reactions received on all messages

notifyForUnreadOnly.description: If the value is false, the notification will contain all the messages, not just unread.

uid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the receiver.

avatar.description: URL to the profile picture of the user receiving the message.

link.description: Profile page URL of the receiver.

role.description: Role of the receiver. Should be created already via the Create role API.

createdAt.description: A 10-digit timestamp at which the receiver was created.

tags.description: A string array containing receiver tags.

uid.description: The primary-key/ unique identifier of the sender.

avatar.description: URL to the profile picture of the user sending the message.

link.description: Profile page URL of the sender.

role.description: Role of the sender. Should be created already via the Create role API.

createdAt.description: A 10-digit timestamp at which the sender was created.

tags.description: A string array containing sender tags.

authToken.name: authToken
authToken.description: An auth token of a user.

uid--conversation.name: uid
uid--conversation.description: UID of the user whose conversation needs to be fetched.

guid--conversation.name: guid
guid--conversation.description: GUID of the group whose conversation needs to be fetched.

requiredonBehalfOf.name: onBehalfOf
requiredonBehalfOf.description: UID of the user on whose behalf the action is performed.

onBehalfOf.name: onBehalfOf
onBehalfOf.description: UID of the user on whose behalf the action is performed.

apiKey.description: API Key with fullAccess scope(i.e. Rest API Key from the Dashboard).
apiKey.name: apikey
